item.title: 更新HUGO步骤
item.description: 1.新建博客 1hugo new post/*.md 2.更新静态网页 1hugo --theme=hugo-clarity --baseUrl="https://Jerrysmd.github.io/" 3.推到GithubPages 1cd public/ 2git add . 3git commit -m 'update blog' 4git push -u origin master

item.title: 读取二进制文件
item.description: 1.creat FILE pointer and set mode as 'rb' 1FILE *f = fopen(inputFN, "rb"); 2.check the FILE pointer is not null 1if (!f) { 2 fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: unable to open file \"%s\": %s\n", inputFN,strerror(errno)); 3 return NULL; 4} 3.use fseek/ftell to get data length fseek(f,0,SEEK_END) put the pointer to the end of the file,ftell(f) can get the current offset, then use fseek(f,0,SEEK_SET) put the pointer to the start of file. 1if (fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END) !

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

draft:true +++ author = "Hugo Authors" title = "Emoji Support" date = "2019-03-05" description = "Guide to emoji usage in Hugo" tags = [ "emoji", ] +++

Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
